name: Hell of a Game
description:
Pinball machine where the ball is a corpse and the paddles are bombs

Baby Lucy tries to impress Daddy Satan by torturing the lost souls of the netherworld. To do that, Lucy elaborated devilish torture methods that would make the CIA blush.

The main idea of this game is to extend the torture of the Lost Soul as much as possible with the use of bombs and torture machines.

Controls:

Lucy drags the bombs into the stage with the left mouse button and right clicks on them to blast the corpse outward. Keypad buttons that correspond to the bomb numbers also works.

Remember! When the bomb's outer circle is touching the corpse, it is blasted further than when it is closer.

Camera Controls:

You can move the camera around with WASD, zoom in and out with R and F and find the Lost Soul by holding Left Shift.
